mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(d.emoji_id) as cnt, d.emoji_id as id, e.category_id as category_id, e.text as text, ec.color as color, ec.name as category_name FROM diary d JOIN emoji e on e.id = d.emoji_id JOIN emoji_category ec on ec.id = e.category_id WHERE DATE(create_date) = #{date} OR DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m') = #{date} GROUP BY d.emoji_id

SELECT DISTINCT
DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m') AS `date` DATE(create_date) AS `date`
FROM diary where login_id = #{loginId} AND #{stdYear} = YEAR(create_date)
AND #{stdMonth} = MONTH(create_date) AND #{stdDate} = DAY(create_date) ORDER BY create_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary (id, content, emoji_id, login_id, create_date) VALUES(#{id}, #{content}, #{emojiId}, #{loginId}, #{createDate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM diary WHERE id = #{diaryId} and login_id = #{loginId}
